item.title: whatweb
item.description: whatweb Installation Usage whatweb [options] <URLs> Flags TARGET SELECTION: <TARGETs> Enter URLs, hostnames, IP addresses, filenames or IP ranges in CIDR, x.x.x-x, or x.x.x.x-x.x.x.x format. --input-file=FILE, -i Read targets from a file. You can pipe hostnames or URLs directly with -i /dev/stdin. TARGET MODIFICATION: --url-prefix Add a prefix to target URLs. --url-suffix Add a suffix to target URLs. --url-pattern Insert the targets into a URL. Requires --input-file, eg. www.

item.title: Identify Website Technologies
item.description: Identify Website Technologies External services Service info builtwith Find out what websites are Built With Browser plugins Service info Wappalyzer Uncovers technologies used on websites Related tools Tools Description whatweb WhatWeb identifies websites.
